about_the_game:
Character overview

The 16 in the name of the game means that there are 16 women in your exploration story, your secret is hidden among them, have sex, and let them get satisfied, you can get the clues you need......

Overview of sex

16 women, will develop more than 30 sex CG, there are easy to get, there are hidden deep, so can you turn them all on?

It is important to note here that ！！！！！！ Most of the sex CG in it, you don't just watch, you need to use your hands to participate, every time you force, you will get feedback from those women. You need to pay attention, don't only care about their own orgasm, let them orgasm can get a high rating yo!!!

Auxiliary character

Of course, it is not all seductive women here, there are also dangerous men, scheming men, they may have obstacles to you.

Survival overview

You want to find the woman of your dreams, you want to recover the lost memory, then you must first live, live you must go to make money. There are three participating mini games that can earn money, bar, Courier, and arcade. The bar is your first step to making money, because the women there will pay you according to your sexual ability......

Mini-game Overview

The form of small games is pixel painting, so that you have a different feeling. All interfaces are pixel representations.

Plot summary

You have memory loss, and in a blurry state, all you remember is that you're a good race car driver, and you lost your memory in an accident. Dream, there is a woman will often appear, you want to find her, because you know, she is not a dream, is real. In the process of searching, you gradually clear your memory, step by step to uncover the secret. Why did you lose your memory, what was your story with the woman, how did the racing accident happen...... Step into the plot and you'll know everything. Of course, all you've lost is your memory, and your ability to have sex hasn't been affected at all. It is the ability to retain that allows you to meet the women in your life, and those women may give you a lot of clues, so that you can find your memory faster, find everything you lost......

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a lot of pornography, nudity and sexual intercourse

name: SixteenPetals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB,OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 850 MB available space

short_description: This is an urban theme love interaction + clue puzzle game. You often dream of a woman, in order to find her and memory, you explore the city. You will meet a lot of women and have heart-pounding stories with them. It's possible to find the woman of your dreams and lost memories
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
